All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Spring Boot Application with run method
AuthController
Controls the mapping of auth page which contains all the requests related to log in.
CartController
Controls the mapping of the cart page and all related to add and keep the control of products, in this case, shoesEntity
CartService
Service that manage all mapping about CartService specially used in cart functions like add and show
ErrorController
Controls the mapping of the error page to redirect everyone to the 404 error page when an invalid url is typed
ForgotPasswordRestController
Controls the mapping of forgot page which contains all the requests related to forgot and recovery the password.
HomeController
Controls the mapping of the home page
MailService
Service that manage all mapping about mailService specially used in forgotPassword
RegisterRestController
Controls the mapping of forgot page which contains all the requests related to register and validate the user account.
SecurityService
Service that manage all about security
Shoes
Contains all the information shoesEntity can have inside the web application
UnsupportedExportException
Exception thrown when it is impossible to export the Shoes database to a JSON Array
User
Deprecated.
Nowadays unused, probably used in the future with database implementation
UserNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a User is not found in database
UserService
Service that manage all about authenticate and serves the process of login and register of someone inside the Web Application
